entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023
